channel.title: [pi] error when opening items such as caskets

item.title: [pi] error when opening items such as caskets
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

it does this: like every 5 or so

here is the code:
itemassistant

public int[] presentreward = {15027, 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048, 1053, 1055, 1057, 1037, 13661, 15038, 15037, 11696, 15003, 15000, 15050, 15038, 4151, 15019, 15006, 15017, 15007, 15018, 10732, 15020, 6666, 15031}; public void handlePresent(int itemId) { int reward = presentreward[Misc.random(36)]; addItem(reward, 1); deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.sendMessage("You recieve a random reward from the present."); }

and clickitem

if (itemId == 6542) { c.getItems().handlePresent(itemId); }

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] error when opening items such as caskets
